head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths MESSINA, BENJAMIN J.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths MESSINA, BENJAMIN J.

block.p: MESSINA-Benjamin J. (Retired fireman NYC Fire Department.) Of Mineola, NY, and formerly of Richmond Hill, NY. On October 26, 1997. Beloved husband of Anita. Devoted father of John Messina and Barbara Val. Loving father-inlaw of Anne. Adored grandfather of Susan Messina, Cynthia Luongo and Christopher Messina. Dear brother of Josephine Girardi, Jennie Pugliese and Mary Casella. Visiting Tuesday and Wednesday, 25 and 7-10 PM, at Weigand Bros. Funeral Home, 49 Hillside Ave, Williston Park, NY. Funeral Mass Thursday, 10 AM, at St. Aidan's R.C. Church. Entombment Pinelawn Memorial Park.
